#summary Site

= Site =

A site is the next level below a [System] for managing a set of  [Channel channels].  Use a different site for each trunked radio tower location, or to organize a collection of related channels.

When a [Channel] within the [Site] is actively decoding, the system icon is colored Green.

http://sdrtrunk.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Site.png

= Creating a New Site =

2. Right-click on a [System] folder and select 'New Site'.

3. Select the new [Site] and update the name in the editor.  Click 'Save'.

= Deleting a Site =

2. Right-click on the [Site] and select 'Delete'

= Changing a Site Name =

2. Select the site from the list.

3. Update the name in the editor and click 'Save'
